insertMatrix(Matrix, int, int) - Method in class game.Matrix
Copies the values from another matrix onto this one.
IrregularTileLayer - Class in game
This class is a tile layer, part of a tile map, that has not yet been "normalized." Tile layers stored in the file are made up of "chunks", which are sections of a tile layer.
IrregularTileLayer() - Constructor for class game.IrregularTileLayer
Constructs a new instance of an irregular tile layer.
isExited() - Method in class game.platforms.awt.GameUi
Indicates whether or not the program has exited.

Indicates whether or not a tile is flipped vertically.
isValid(long) - Static method in class game.TileID
